title: Southern fried chicken
description: This authentic recipe requires 48 hours advance prep but is definitely worth the effort. Pair with spicy coleslaw and cornbread for a real taste of the deep south.
ingredients: ¼ head purple cabbage, thinly shredded
6 chipotle chillies in adobo sauce, julienned
6 jalapeno chillies, seeds and viens removed, finely julienned
2 carrots, shaved into ribbons using a peeler
6 garlic cloves, peeled and lightly crushed
2 tbsp Mexican oregano (or 1 tbsp Mediterranean oregano)
